author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the parsing of parton shower weight names in `GenWeightsTableProducer`. 

It seems that with the update of Pythia to 8.309 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8552) the name of the PS weights in `GenLumiInfoHeader` changed from `fsr:murfac=0.5` to `fsr.murfac=0.5`. This PR fixes the parsing to take into account both cases. Without the fix, the producer simply takes the weights at indices 6--10 which do not correspond to the nominal isr/fsr variations.

Along with the fix, the branch doc string of `PSWeight` is also updated to fill in actual branch names from the header to provide a cross check.

#### PR validation:

Tested with NANO workflows.

FYI - @cms-sw/generators-l2
title: [NANO] Fix PS weight parsing
